New Records: LaMelo Ball scored 32 points and grabbed 10 rebounds, setting career highs in the process.
The Charlotte Hornets snapped their 10-game losing streak with this victory.
The Hornets' starting lineup of LaMelo Ball, Miles Bridges, Nick Richards, and others played together for the first time this season.
Key Match Events: Charlotte dominated the Suns in the second quarter, outscoring them 37-17.
Brandon Miller made a crucial three-pointer with 1:21 left in the game to extend the Hornets' lead to 11 points.
The Hornets outrebounded the Suns 59-42, a key factor in their win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phoenix Suns struggled with scoring outside of Devin Booker and Kevin Durant, as Bradley Beal was limited to 10 points on 5-of-13 shooting.
